name: Modern Times Archeologist
description:
Our society has fallen, the survivors reorganized in community, now they reached out a balance and they decided to discover what brought our modern society to collapse. So, they created an archeologist guild and you are the chief of this guild.

You'll have to manage your guild by sending the right team of archeologist by considering their specialization and their affinites. The goal is to bring back items of our modern society and try to answer at the questions of the community residents.

Development team :

Martin Coudrin : Game Designer, Graphist

Martin Valleix : Game Designer, Programmation
